ConfigurationOption.Value: select sd.domainid, sd.maxvalue, sd.value, sd.description, aa.optionname, aa.groupname, sd.siteid, sd.orgid, sd.synonymdomainid, aa.applicationauthid from synonymdomain sd left join applicationauth aa on aa.app = ( case sd.domainid when 'WOSTATUS' then 'WOTRACK' when 'SRSTATUS' then 'SR' when 'INVUSESTATUS' then 'INVUSAGE' else 'INVALID' end ) and aa.optionname = ( case sd.maxvalue when 'CAN' then 'CANCEL' when 'INPRG' then 'INIT' when 'NEW' then 'INSERT' when 'WAPPR' then 'SAVE' else sd.maxvalue end )

List.ListEntry: aa.groupname in ( select gu.groupname from groupuser gu where gu.userid = '${MX_USER_ID}' )
